page.title: 05LIFE ON THE CANAL
page.content: In 1985 the canal is mainly used by tourists.People from all over the world come to the canal including succesful Canadians and Americans. The villagers use the canal a lot to fish and to go for walks.Our locks are looked after by Mr Butter.He has won three competitions in 1980 and 1982 for he dug out flower borders in recent years. Things like Adderley and BWB were dug out on the bank and blue flowers were planted in the shapes. The barge has been taken away now and left just the BWB.He has also done D&C commemorating the marriage of Prince Charles.The flowers are colourful and appreciated.Mr Butter is a big ,strong,kind and particularly anxious to get on with things.
